critical-error.title: Critical error

widget-error.title: Failed to initialize a widget
widget-error.message-custom:
Custom widget from note with ID "{{id}}", titled "{{title}}" could not be initialized due to:

{{message}}
widget-error.message-unknown:
Unknown widget could not be initialized due to:

{{message}}

bundle-error.title: Failed to load a custom script
bundle-error.message:
Script could not be executed due to:

{{message}}

widget-list-error.title: Failed to obtain the list of widgets from the server

widget-render-error.title: Failed to render a custom React widget

toast.widget-missing-parent:
Custom widget does not have mandatory '{{property}}' property defined.

If this script is meant to be run without a UI element, use '#run=frontendStartup' instead.

add_link.search_note: search for note by its name
add_link.link_title_mirrors: link title mirrors the note's current title
add_link.link_title_arbitrary: link title can be changed arbitrarily

branch_prefix.branch_prefix_saved_multiple: Branch prefix has been saved for {{count}} branches.

bulk_actions.include_descendants: Include descendants of the selected notes
bulk_actions.bulk_actions_executed: Bulk actions have been executed successfully.
bulk_actions.none_yet: None yet... add an action by clicking one of the available ones above.

clone_to.search_for_note_by_its_name: search for note by its name
clone_to.cloned_note_prefix_title: Cloned note will be shown in note tree with given prefix

confirm.are_you_sure_remove_note: Are you sure you want to remove the note "{{title}}" from relation map?
confirm.if_you_dont_check: If you don't check this, the note will be only removed from the relation map.

delete_notes.delete_all_clones_description: Delete also all clones (can be undone in recent changes)
delete_notes.erase_notes_description: Normal (soft) deletion only marks the notes as deleted and they can be undeleted (in recent changes dialog) within a period of time. Checking this option will erase the notes immediately and it won't be possible to undelete the notes.
delete_notes.erase_notes_warning: Erase notes permanently (can't be undone), including all clones. This will force application reload.
delete_notes.no_note_to_delete: No note will be deleted (only clones).
delete_notes.broken_relations_to_be_deleted: Following relations will be broken and deleted ({{ relationCount}})
delete_notes.deleted_relation_text: Note {{- note}} (to be deleted) is referenced by relation {{- relation}} originating from {{- source}}.

export.export_type_subtree: This note and all of its descendants
export.format_html: HTML - recommended as it keeps all format
export.format_html_zip: HTML in ZIP archive - this is recommended since this preserves all the formatting.
export.format_markdown: Markdown - this preserves most of the formatting.
export.format_opml: OPML - outliner interchange format for text only. Formatting, images and files are not included.
export.export_type_single: Only this note without its descendants
export.format_pdf: PDF - for printing or sharing purposes.
export.share-format: HTML for web publishing - uses the same theme that is used shared notes, but can be published as a static website.

help.title: Cheatsheet
help.goUpDown: go up/down in the list of notes
help.goBackForwards: go back / forwards in the history
help.newTabNoteLink: on note link opens note in a new tab
help.newTabWithActivationNoteLink: on note link opens and activates the note in a new tab
help.createNoteAfter: create new note after the active note
help.createNoteInto: create new sub-note into active note
help.editBranchPrefix: edit prefix of active note clone
help.moveNoteUpDown: move note up/down in the note list
help.moveNoteUpHierarchy: move note up in the hierarchy
help.selectAllNotes: select all notes in the current level
help.copyNotes: copy active note (or current selection) into clipboard (used for cloning)
help.cutNotes: cut current note (or current selection) into clipboard (used for moving notes)
help.pasteNotes: paste note(s) as sub-note into active note (which is either move or clone depending on whether it was copied or cut into clipboard)
help.editNoteTitle: in tree pane will switch from tree pane into note title. Enter from note title will switch focus to text editor. <kbd>Ctrl+.</kbd> will switch back from editor to tree pane.
help.insertDateTime: insert current date and time at caret position
help.jumpToTreePane: jump away to the tree pane and scroll to active note
help.headings: ##, ###, #### etc. followed by space for headings
help.bulletList: * or - followed by space for bullet list
help.numberedList: 1. or 1) followed by space for numbered list
help.blockQuote: start a line with > followed by space for block quote

import.importDescription: Content of the selected file(s) will be imported as child note(s) into
import.importZipRecommendation: When importing a ZIP file, the note hierarchy will reflect the subdirectory structure within the archive.
import.safeImportTooltip: Trilium .zip export files can contain executable scripts which may contain harmful behavior. Safe import will deactivate automatic execution of all imported scripts. Uncheck "Safe import" only if the imported archive is supposed to contain executable scripts and you completely trust the contents of the import file.
import.explodeArchivesTooltip: If this is checked then Trilium will read .zip, .enex and .opml files and create notes from files insides those archives. If unchecked, then Trilium will attach the archives themselves to the note.
import.shrinkImagesTooltip:
If you check this option, Trilium will attempt to shrink the imported images by scaling and optimization which may affect the perceived image quality. If unchecked, images will be imported without changes.

This doesn't apply to .zip imports with metadata since it is assumed these files are already optimized.
import.textImportedAsText: Import HTML, Markdown and TXT as text notes if it's unclear from metadata
import.codeImportedAsCode: Import recognized code files (e.g. .json) as code notes if it's unclear from metadata
import.replaceUnderscoresWithSpaces: Replace underscores with spaces in imported note names

html_import_tags.title: HTML Import Tags
html_import_tags.description: Configure which HTML tags should be preserved when importing notes. Tags not in this list will be removed during import. Some tags (like 'script') are always removed for security.
html_import_tags.placeholder: Enter HTML tags, one per line

include_note.placeholder_search: search for note by its name
include_note.box_size_prompt: Box size of the included note:

jump_to_note.search_placeholder: Search for note by its name or type > for commands...

markdown_import.modal_body_text: Because of browser sandbox it's not possible to directly read clipboard from JavaScript. Please paste the Markdown to import to textarea below and click on Import button
markdown_import.import_success: Markdown content has been imported into the document.

move_to.search_placeholder: search for note by its name
move_to.move_success_message: Selected notes have been moved into

note_type_chooser.change_path_prompt: Change where to create the new note:
note_type_chooser.search_placeholder: search path by name (default if empty)
note_type_chooser.modal_body: Choose note type / template of the new note:

password_not_set.title: Password is not set
password_not_set.body1: Protected notes are encrypted using a user password, but password has not been set yet.
password_not_set.body2: To be able to protect notes, click the button below to open the Options dialog and set your password.

protected_session_password.form_label: To proceed with requested action you need to start protected session by entering password:

recent_changes.title: Recent changes
recent_changes.confirm_undelete: Do you want to undelete this note and its sub-notes?

revisions.delete_all_revisions: Delete all revisions of this note
revisions.confirm_delete_all: Do you want to delete all revisions of this note?
revisions.no_revisions: No revisions for this note yet...
revisions.diff_on_hint: Click to show note source diff
revisions.confirm_restore: Do you want to restore this revision? This will overwrite the current title and content of the note with this revision.
revisions.confirm_delete: Do you want to delete this revision?
revisions.preview_not_available: Preview isn't available for this note type.

sort_child_notes.title: title
sort_child_notes.sort_with_respect_to_different_character: sort with respect to different character sorting and collation rules in different languages or regions.
sort_child_notes.the_language_code_for_natural_sort: The language code for natural sort, e.g. "zh-CN" for Chinese.

upload_attachments.files_will_be_uploaded: Files will be uploaded as attachments into {{noteTitle}}
upload_attachments.tooltip: If you check this option, Trilium will attempt to shrink the uploaded images by scaling and optimization which may affect the perceived image quality. If unchecked, images will be uploaded without changes.

attribute_detail.attr_name_title: Attribute name can be composed of alphanumeric characters, colon and underscore only
attribute_detail.name: Name
attribute_detail.target_note_title: Relation is a named connection between source note and target note.
attribute_detail.promoted_title: Promoted attribute is displayed prominently on the note.
attribute_detail.promoted_alias_title: The name to be displayed in the promoted attributes UI.
attribute_detail.multiplicity_title: Multiplicity defines how many attributes of the same name can be created - at max 1 or more than 1.
attribute_detail.label_type_title: Type of the label will help Trilium to choose suitable interface to enter the label value.
attribute_detail.precision_title: What number of digits after floating point should be available in the value setting interface.
attribute_detail.inverse_relation_title: Optional setting to define to which relation is this one opposite. Example: Father - Son are inverse relations to each other.
attribute_detail.inheritable_title: Inheritable attribute will be inherited to all descendants under this tree.
attribute_detail.label: Label detail
attribute_detail.disable_versioning: disables auto-versioning. Useful for e.g. large, but unimportant notes - e.g. large JS libraries used for scripting
attribute_detail.calendar_root: marks note which should be used as root for day notes. Only one should be marked as such.
attribute_detail.archived: notes with this label won't be visible by default in search results (also in Jump To, Add Link dialogs etc).
attribute_detail.exclude_from_export: notes (with their sub-tree) won't be included in any note export
attribute_detail.run:
defines on which events script should run. Possible values are:
  • frontendStartup - when Trilium frontend starts up (or is refreshed), but not on mobile.
  • mobileStartup - when Trilium frontend starts up (or is refreshed), on mobile.
  • backendStartup - when Trilium backend starts up
  • hourly - run once an hour. You can use additional label runAtHour to specify at which hour.
  • daily - run once a day
attribute_detail.run_on_instance: Define which trilium instance should run this on. Default to all instances.
attribute_detail.run_at_hour: On which hour should this run. Should be used together with #run=hourly. Can be defined multiple times for more runs during the day.
attribute_detail.disable_inclusion: scripts with this label won't be included into parent script execution.
attribute_detail.sorted: keeps child notes sorted by title alphabetically
attribute_detail.sort_folders_first: Folders (notes with children) should be sorted on top
attribute_detail.top: keep given note on top in its parent (applies only on sorted parents)
attribute_detail.hide_promoted_attributes: Hide promoted attributes on this note
attribute_detail.read_only: editor is in read only mode. Works only for text and code notes.
attribute_detail.auto_read_only_disabled: text/code notes can be set automatically into read mode when they are too large. You can disable this behavior on per-note basis by adding this label to the note
attribute_detail.app_css: marks CSS notes which are loaded into the Trilium application and can thus be used to modify Trilium's looks.
attribute_detail.app_theme: marks CSS notes which are full Trilium themes and are thus available in Trilium options.
attribute_detail.app_theme_base: set to "next", "next-light", or "next-dark" to use the corresponding TriliumNext theme (auto, light or dark) as the base for a custom theme, instead of the legacy one.
attribute_detail.css_class: value of this label is then added as CSS class to the node representing given note in the tree. This can be useful for advanced theming. Can be used in template notes.
attribute_detail.icon_class: value of this label is added as a CSS class to the icon on the tree which can help visually distinguish the notes in the tree. Example might be bx bx-home - icons are taken from boxicons. Can be used in template notes.
attribute_detail.page_size: number of items per page in note listing
attribute_detail.widget: marks this note as a custom widget which will be added to the Trilium component tree
attribute_detail.workspace: marks this note as a workspace which allows easy hoisting
attribute_detail.workspace_icon_class: defines box icon CSS class which will be used in tab when hoisted to this note
attribute_detail.workspace_tab_background_color: CSS color used in the note tab when hoisted to this note
attribute_detail.workspace_template: This note will appear in the selection of available template when creating new note, but only when hoisted into a workspace containing this template
attribute_detail.search_home: new search notes will be created as children of this note
attribute_detail.workspace_search_home: new search notes will be created as children of this note when hoisted to some ancestor of this workspace note
attribute_detail.inbox: default inbox location for new notes - when you create a note using "new note" button in the sidebar, notes will be created as child notes in the note marked as with #inbox label.
attribute_detail.workspace_inbox: default inbox location for new notes when hoisted to some ancestor of this workspace note
attribute_detail.sql_console_home: default location of SQL console notes
attribute_detail.bookmark_folder: note with this label will appear in bookmarks as folder (allowing access to its children)
attribute_detail.share_hidden_from_tree: this note is hidden from left navigation tree, but still accessible with its URL
attribute_detail.share_external_link: note will act as a link to an external website in the share tree
attribute_detail.share_alias: define an alias using which the note will be available under https://your_trilium_host/share/[your_alias]
attribute_detail.share_omit_default_css: default share page CSS will be omitted. Use when you make extensive styling changes.
attribute_detail.share_root: marks note which is served on /share root.
attribute_detail.share_description: define text to be added to the HTML meta tag for description
attribute_detail.share_raw: note will be served in its raw format, without HTML wrapper
attribute_detail.share_disallow_robot_indexing: will forbid robot indexing of this note via X-Robots-Tag: noindex header
attribute_detail.share_credentials: require credentials to access this shared note. Value is expected to be in format 'username:password'. Don't forget to make this inheritable to apply to child-notes/images.
attribute_detail.share_index: note with this label will list all roots of shared notes
attribute_detail.display_relations: comma delimited names of relations which should be displayed. All other ones will be hidden.
attribute_detail.hide_relations: comma delimited names of relations which should be hidden. All other ones will be displayed.
attribute_detail.title_template:
default title of notes created as children of this note. The value is evaluated as JavaScript string and thus can be enriched with dynamic content via the injected now and parentNote variables. Examples:
  • ${parentNote.getLabelValue('authorName')}'s literary works
  • Log for ${now.format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss')}
See wiki with details, API docs for parentNote and now for details.
attribute_detail.template: This note will appear in the selection of available template when creating new note
attribute_detail.toc: #toc or #toc=show will force the Table of Contents to be shown, #toc=hide will force hiding it. If the label doesn't exist, the global setting is observed
attribute_detail.color: defines color of the note in note tree, links etc. Use any valid CSS color value like 'red' or #a13d5f
attribute_detail.keyboard_shortcut: Defines a keyboard shortcut which will immediately jump to this note. Example: 'ctrl+alt+e'. Requires frontend reload for the change to take effect.
attribute_detail.keep_current_hoisting: Opening this link won't change hoisting even if the note is not displayable in the current hoisted subtree.
attribute_detail.execute_button: Title of the button which will execute the current code note
attribute_detail.execute_description: Longer description of the current code note displayed together with the execute button
attribute_detail.exclude_from_note_map: Notes with this label will be hidden from the Note Map
attribute_detail.new_notes_on_top: New notes will be created at the top of the parent note, not on the bottom.
attribute_detail.run_on_note_creation: executes when note is created on backend. Use this relation if you want to run the script for all notes created under a specific subtree. In that case, create it on the subtree root note and make it inheritable. A new note created within the subtree (any depth) will trigger the script.
attribute_detail.run_on_child_note_creation: executes when new note is created under the note where this relation is defined
attribute_detail.run_on_note_title_change: executes when note title is changed (includes note creation as well)
attribute_detail.run_on_note_content_change: executes when note content is changed (includes note creation as well).
attribute_detail.run_on_note_change: executes when note is changed (includes note creation as well). Does not include content changes
attribute_detail.run_on_note_deletion: executes when note is being deleted
attribute_detail.run_on_branch_creation: executes when a branch is created. Branch is a link between parent note and child note and is created e.g. when cloning or moving note.
attribute_detail.run_on_branch_change: executes when a branch is updated.
attribute_detail.run_on_branch_deletion: executes when a branch is deleted. Branch is a link between parent note and child note and is deleted e.g. when moving note (old branch/link is deleted).
attribute_detail.run_on_attribute_creation: executes when new attribute is created for the note which defines this relation
attribute_detail.run_on_attribute_change: executes when the attribute is changed of a note which defines this relation. This is triggered also when the attribute is deleted
attribute_detail.relation_template: note's attributes will be inherited even without a parent-child relationship, note's content and subtree will be added to instance notes if empty. See documentation for details.
attribute_detail.inherit: note's attributes will be inherited even without a parent-child relationship. See template relation for a similar concept. See attribute inheritance in the documentation.
attribute_detail.render_note: notes of type "render HTML note" will be rendered using a code note (HTML or script) and it is necessary to point using this relation to which note should be rendered
attribute_detail.widget_relation: target of this relation will be executed and rendered as a widget in the sidebar
attribute_detail.share_css: CSS note which will be injected into the share page. CSS note must be in the shared sub-tree as well. Consider using 'share_hidden_from_tree' and 'share_omit_default_css' as well.
attribute_detail.share_js: JavaScript note which will be injected into the share page. JS note must be in the shared sub-tree as well. Consider using 'share_hidden_from_tree'.
attribute_detail.share_template: Embedded JavaScript note that will be used as the template for displaying the shared note. Falls back to the default template. Consider using 'share_hidden_from_tree'.
attribute_detail.share_favicon: Favicon note to be set in the shared page. Typically you want to set it to share root and make it inheritable. Favicon note must be in the shared sub-tree as well. Consider using 'share_hidden_from_tree'.
attribute_detail.print_landscape: When exporting to PDF, changes the orientation of the page to landscape instead of portrait.
attribute_detail.print_page_size: When exporting to PDF, changes the size of the page. Supported values: A0, A1, A2, A3, A4, A5, A6, Legal, Letter, Tabloid, Ledger.

attribute_editor.help_text_body1: To add label, just type e.g. #rock or if you want to add also value then e.g. #year = 2020
attribute_editor.help_text_body2: For relation, type ~author = @ which should bring up an autocomplete where you can look up the desired note.
attribute_editor.help_text_body3: Alternatively you can add label and relation using the + button on the right side.
attribute_editor.placeholder: Type the labels and relations here

execute_script.help_text: You can execute simple scripts on the matched notes.
execute_script.example_1: For example to append a string to a note's title, use this small script:
execute_script.example_2: More complex example would be deleting all matched note's attributes:

add_label.label_name_title: Alphanumeric characters, underscore and colon are allowed characters.
add_label.help_text_item1: create given label if note doesn't have one yet
add_label.help_text_item2: or change value of the existing label
add_label.help_text_note: You can also call this method without value, in such case label will be assigned to the note without value.

delete_label.label_name_title: Alphanumeric characters, underscore and colon are allowed characters.

rename_label.name_title: Alphanumeric characters, underscore and colon are allowed characters.

update_label_value.label_name_title: Alphanumeric characters, underscore and colon are allowed characters.
update_label_value.help_text: On all matched notes, change value of the existing label.
update_label_value.help_text_note: You can also call this method without value, in such case label will be assigned to the note without value.

delete_note.undelete_notes_instruction: After the deletion, it's possible to undelete them from Recent Changes dialog.
delete_note.erase_notes_instruction: To erase notes permanently, you can go after the deletion to the Option -> Other and click the "Erase deleted notes now" button.

delete_revisions.all_past_note_revisions: All past note revisions of matched notes will be deleted. Note itself will be fully preserved. In other terms, note's history will be removed.

move_note.move_note_new_parent: move note to the new parent if note has only one parent (i.e. the old branch is removed and new branch into the new parent is created)
move_note.clone_note_new_parent: clone note to the new parent if note has multiple clones/branches (it's not clear which branch should be removed)
move_note.nothing_will_happen: nothing will happen if note cannot be moved to the target note (i.e. this would create a tree cycle)

rename_note.click_help_icon: Click help icon on the right to see all the options
rename_note.evaluated_as_js_string: The given value is evaluated as JavaScript string and thus can be enriched with dynamic content via the injected note variable (note being renamed). Examples:
rename_note.example_note: Note - all matched notes are renamed to 'Note'
rename_note.example_new_title: NEW: ${note.title} - matched notes titles are prefixed with 'NEW: '
rename_note.example_date_prefix: ${note.dateCreatedObj.format('MM-DD:')}: ${note.title} - matched notes are prefixed with note's creation month-date
rename_note.api_docs: See API docs for note and its dateCreatedObj / utcDateCreatedObj properties for details.

add_relation.allowed_characters: Alphanumeric characters, underscore and colon are allowed characters.
add_relation.create_relation_on_all_matched_notes: On all matched notes create given relation.

delete_relation.allowed_characters: Alphanumeric characters, underscore and colon are allowed characters.

rename_relation.allowed_characters: Alphanumeric characters, underscore and colon are allowed characters.

update_relation_target.allowed_characters: Alphanumeric characters, underscore and colon are allowed characters.
update_relation_target.change_target_note: change target note of the existing relation

attachments_actions.open_externally_title: File will be open in an external application and watched for changes. You'll then be able to upload the modified version back to Trilium.
attachments_actions.open_custom_title: File will be open in an external application and watched for changes. You'll then be able to upload the modified version back to Trilium.
attachments_actions.upload_success: New attachment revision has been uploaded.
attachments_actions.upload_failed: Upload of a new attachment revision failed.
attachments_actions.open_externally_detail_page: Opening attachment externally is available only from the detail page, please first click on the attachment detail first and repeat the action.
attachments_actions.open_custom_client_only: Custom opening of attachments can only be done from the desktop client.
attachments_actions.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete attachment '{{title}}'?
attachments_actions.convert_confirm: Are you sure you want to convert attachment '{{title}}' into a separate note?
attachments_actions.convert_success: Attachment '{{title}}' has been converted to note.

global_menu.reload_hint: Reload can help with some visual glitches without restarting the whole app.

sync_status.unknown:
Sync status will be known once the next sync attempt starts.

Click to trigger sync now.
sync_status.connected_with_changes:
Connected to the sync server.
There are some outstanding changes yet to be synced.

Click to trigger sync.
sync_status.connected_no_changes:
Connected to the sync server.
All changes have been already synced.

Click to trigger sync.
sync_status.disconnected_with_changes:
Establishing the connection to the sync server was unsuccessful.
There are some outstanding changes yet to be synced.

Click to trigger sync.
sync_status.disconnected_no_changes:
Establishing the connection to the sync server was unsuccessful.
All known changes have been synced.

Click to trigger sync.
sync_status.in_progress: Sync with the server is in progress.

note_actions.open_note_externally_title: File will be open in an external application and watched for changes. You'll then be able to upload the modified version back to Trilium.
note_actions.convert_into_attachment_successful: Note '{{title}}' has been converted to attachment.
note_actions.convert_into_attachment_prompt: Are you sure you want to convert note '{{title}}' into an attachment of the parent note?

onclick_button.no_click_handler: Button widget '{{componentId}}' has no defined click handler

protected_session_status.active: Protected session is active. Click to leave protected session.

note_launcher.this_launcher_doesnt_define_target_note: This launcher doesn't define target note.

code_buttons.sql_console_saved_message: SQL Console note has been saved into {{note_path}}

copy_image_reference_button.button_title: Copy image reference to the clipboard, can be pasted into a text note.

relation_map_buttons.create_child_note_title: Create new child note and add it into this relation map
relation_map_buttons.reset_pan_zoom_title: Reset pan & zoom to initial coordinates and magnification

book_properties.expand_tooltip: Expands the direct children of this collection (one level deep). For more options, press the arrow on the right.

edited_notes.no_edited_notes_found: No edited notes on this day yet...
edited_notes.title: Edited Notes

file_properties.upload_success: New file revision has been uploaded.
file_properties.upload_failed: Upload of a new file revision failed.
file_properties.title: File

image_properties.upload_success: New image revision has been uploaded.
image_properties.upload_failed: Upload of a new image revision failed: {{message}}
image_properties.title: Image

note_info_widget.note_size_info: Note size provides rough estimate of storage requirements for this note. It takes into account note's content and content of its note revisions.
note_info_widget.title: Note Info

note_paths.title: Note Paths
note_paths.intro_placed: This note is placed into the following paths:
note_paths.intro_not_placed: This note is not yet placed into the note tree.
note_paths.outside_hoisted: This path is outside of hoisted note and you would have to unhoist.

note_properties.this_note_was_originally_taken_from: This note was originally taken from:

search_definition.fast_search_description: Fast search option disables full text search of note contents which might speed up searching in large databases.
search_definition.include_archived_notes_description: Archived notes are by default excluded from search results, with this option they will be included.
search_definition.debug_description: Debug will print extra debugging information into the console to aid in debugging complex queries
search_definition.search_note_saved: Search note has been saved into {{- notePathTitle}}

abstract_search_option.failed_rendering: Failed rendering search option: {{dto}} with error: {{error}} {{stack}}

ancestor.label: Ancestor
ancestor.placeholder: search for note by its name

debug.debug_info: Debug will print extra debugging information into the console to aid in debugging complex queries.
debug.access_info: To access the debug information, execute query and click on "Show backend log" in top left corner.

fast_search.description: Fast search option disables full text search of note contents which might speed up searching in large databases.

limit.take_first_x_results: Take only first X specified results.

order_by.title: Title
order_by.content_and_attachments_and_revisions_si: Note content size including attachments and revisions
order_by.target_relation_count: Number of relations targeting the note

search_script.title: Search script:
search_script.placeholder: search for note by its name
search_script.description1: Search script allows to define search results by running a script. This provides maximal flexibility when standard search doesn't suffice.
search_script.description2: Search script must be of type "code" and subtype "JavaScript backend". The script needs to return an array of noteIds or notes.
search_script.note: Note that search script and search string can't be combined with each other.

search_string.full_text_search: Just enter any text for full text search
search_string.label_year: matches notes with label year having value 2019
search_string.label_rock_pop: matches notes which have both rock and pop labels
search_string.label_rock_or_pop: only one of the labels must be present
search_string.label_date_created: notes created in the last month

book.no_children_help: This collection doesn't have any child notes so there's nothing to display. See wiki for details.
book.drag_locked_message: Dragging not allowed since the collection is locked for editing.

editable_code.placeholder: Type the content of your code note here...

editable_text.placeholder: Type the content of your note here...
editable_text.editor_crashed_content: Your content was recovered successfully, but a few of your most recent changes may not have been saved.
editable_text.editor_crashed_details_intro: If you experience this error several times, consider reporting it on GitHub by pasting the information below.
editable_text.keeps-crashing: Editing component keeps crashing. Please try restarting Trilium. If problem persists, consider creating a bug report.

empty.open_note_instruction: Open a note by typing the note's title into the input below or choose a note in the tree.
empty.search_placeholder: search for a note by its name

file.file_preview_not_available: File preview is not available for this file format.
file.too_big: The preview only shows the first {{maxNumChars}} characters of the file for performance reasons. Download the file and open it externally to be able to see the entire content.

protected_session.enter_password_instruction: Showing protected note requires entering your password:

relation_map.confirm_remove_relation: Are you sure you want to remove the relation?
relation_map.specify_new_relation_name: Specify new relation name (allowed characters: alphanumeric, colon and underscore):
relation_map.connection_exists: Connection '{{name}}' between these notes already exists.
relation_map.start_dragging_relations: Start dragging relations from here and drop them on another note.
relation_map.note_already_in_diagram: Note "{{title}}" is already in the diagram.
relation_map.click_on_canvas_to_place_new_note: Click on canvas to place new note

render.note_detail_render_help_1: This help note is shown because this note of type Render HTML doesn't have required relation to function properly.
render.note_detail_render_help_2: Render HTML note type is used for scripting. In short, you have a HTML code note (optionally with some JavaScript) and this note will render it. To make it work, you need to define a relation called "renderNote" pointing to the HTML note to render.

web_view.embed_websites: Note of type Web View allows you to embed websites into Trilium.
web_view.create_label: To start, please create a label with a URL address you want to embed, e.g. #webViewSrc="https://www.google.com"

consistency_checks.title: Consistency Checks
consistency_checks.issues_fixed_message: Any consistency issue which may have been found is now fixed.

database_anonymization.title: Database Anonymization
database_anonymization.full_anonymization_description: This action will create a new copy of the database and anonymize it (remove all note content and leave only structure and some non-sensitive metadata) for sharing online for debugging purposes without fear of leaking your personal data.
database_anonymization.light_anonymization_description: This action will create a new copy of the database and do a light anonymization on it  specifically only content of all notes will be removed, but titles and attributes will remain. Additionally, custom JS frontend/backend script notes and custom widgets will remain. This provides more context to debug the issues.
database_anonymization.choose_anonymization: You can decide yourself if you want to provide a fully or lightly anonymized database. Even fully anonymized DB is very useful, however in some cases lightly anonymized database can speed up the process of bug identification and fixing.
database_anonymization.error_creating_anonymized_database: Could not create anonymized database, check backend logs for details

database_integrity_check.title: Database Integrity Check
database_integrity_check.description: This will check that the database is not corrupted on the SQLite level. It might take some time, depending on the DB size.
database_integrity_check.integrity_check_succeeded: Integrity check succeeded - no problems found.

vacuum_database.title: Vacuum Database
vacuum_database.description: This will rebuild the database which will typically result in a smaller database file. No data will be actually changed.

experimental_features.title: Experimental Options
experimental_features.disclaimer: These options are experimental and may cause instability. Use with caution.
experimental_features.new_layout_description: Try out the new layout for a more modern look and improved usability. Subject to heavy change in the upcoming releases.

fonts.note_tree_and_detail_font_sizing: Note that tree and detail font sizing is relative to the main font size setting.
fonts.not_all_fonts_available: Not all listed fonts may be available on your system.
fonts.apply_font_changes: To apply font changes, click on

max_content_width.title: Content Width
max_content_width.default_description: Trilium by default limits max content width to improve readability for maximized screens on wide screens.

ribbon.promoted_attributes_message: Promoted Attributes ribbon tab will automatically open if promoted attributes are present on the note
ribbon.edited_notes_message: Edited Notes ribbon tab will automatically open on day notes

theme.title: Application Theme
theme.layout-vertical-description: launcher bar is on the left (default)
theme.layout-horizontal-description: launcher bar is underneath the tab bar, the tab bar is now full width.

ui-performance.title: Performance
ui-performance.enable-backdrop-effects: Enable background effects for menus, popups and panels
ui-performance.app-restart-required: (a restart of the application is required for the change to take effect)

ai_llm.title: AI Settings
ai_llm.enable_ai_description: Enable AI features like note summarization, content generation, and other LLM capabilities
ai_llm.enable_ai_desc: Enable AI features like note summarization, content generation, and other LLM capabilities
ai_llm.provider_precedence_description: Comma-separated list of providers in order of precedence (e.g., 'openai,anthropic,ollama')
ai_llm.temperature_description: Controls randomness in responses (0 = deterministic, 2 = maximum randomness)
ai_llm.system_prompt_description: Default system prompt used for all AI interactions
ai_llm.openai_api_key_description: Your OpenAI API key for accessing their AI services
ai_llm.anthropic_api_key_description: Your Anthropic API key for accessing Claude models
ai_llm.anthropic_url_description: Base URL for the Anthropic API (default: https://api.anthropic.com)
ai_llm.anthropic_model_description: Anthropic Claude models for chat completion
ai_llm.ollama_url_description: URL for the Ollama API (default: http://localhost:11434)
ai_llm.ollama_model_description: Ollama model to use for chat completion
ai_llm.minimax_url_description: Base URL for the MiniMax API (default: https://api.minimax.io/anthropic)
ai_llm.minimax_model_description: MiniMax model to use for chat completion
ai_llm.enable_ollama_description: Enable Ollama for local AI model usage
ai_llm.rebuild_index_error: Error starting index rebuild. Check logs for details.
ai_llm.retry_failed: Failed to queue note for retry
ai_llm.max_notes_per_llm_query_description: Maximum number of similar notes to include in AI context
ai_llm.similarity_threshold_description: Minimum similarity score (0-1) for notes to be included in context for LLM queries
ai_llm.reprocess_index_started: Search index optimization started in the background
ai_llm.all_notes_queued_for_retry: All failed notes queued for retry
ai_llm.api_key_tooltip: API key for accessing the service

empty_key_warning.anthropic: Anthropic API key is empty. Please enter a valid API key.
empty_key_warning.openai: OpenAI API key is empty. Please enter a valid API key.
empty_key_warning.voyage: Voyage API key is empty. Please enter a valid API key.
empty_key_warning.ollama: Ollama API key is empty. Please enter a valid API key.
empty_key_warning.minimax: MiniMax API key is empty. Please enter a valid API key.

ai_llm.name: AI
ai_llm.enhanced_context_description: Provides the AI with more context from the note and its related notes for better responses
ai_llm.show_thinking_description: Show the AI's chain of thought process
ai_llm.error_contacting_provider: Error contacting AI provider. Please check your settings and internet connection.
ai_llm.ollama_no_url: Ollama is not configured. Please enter a valid URL.

chat.root_note_content: This note contains your saved AI chat conversations.

ai_llm.configuration_warnings: There are some issues with your AI configuration. Please check your settings.
ai_llm.experimental_warning: The LLM feature is currently experimental - you have been warned.
ai_llm.selected_provider_description: Choose the AI provider for chat and completion features
ai_llm.no_models_found_online: No models found. Please check your API key and settings.
ai_llm.no_models_found_ollama: No Ollama models found. Please check if Ollama is running.

zoom_factor.title: Zoom Factor (desktop build only)
zoom_factor.description: Zooming can be controlled with CTRL+- and CTRL+= shortcuts as well.

code_auto_read_only_size.title: Automatic Read-Only Size
code_auto_read_only_size.description: Automatic read-only note size is the size after which notes will be displayed in a read-only mode (for performance reasons).
code_auto_read_only_size.label: Automatic read-only size (code notes)

code_mime_types.title: Available MIME types in the dropdown

vim_key_bindings.enable_vim_keybindings: Enable Vim keybindings in code notes (no ex mode)

wrap_lines.enable_line_wrap: Enable Line Wrap (change might need a frontend reload to take effect)

images.download_images_automatically: Download images automatically for offline use.
images.download_images_description: Pasted HTML can contain references to online images, Trilium will find those references and download the images so that they are available offline.
images.max_image_dimensions: Max width / height of an image (image will be resized if it exceeds this setting).
images.jpeg_quality_description: JPEG quality (10 - worst quality, 100 - best quality, 50 - 85 is recommended)

attachment_erasure_timeout.attachment_auto_deletion_description: Attachments get automatically deleted (and erased) if they are not referenced by their note anymore after a defined time out.
attachment_erasure_timeout.manual_erasing_description: You can also trigger erasing manually (without considering the timeout defined above):

note_erasure_timeout.note_erasure_description: Deleted notes (and attributes, revisions...) are at first only marked as deleted and it is possible to recover them from Recent Notes dialog. After a period of time, deleted notes are "erased" which means their content is not recoverable anymore. This setting allows you to configure the length of the period between deleting and erasing the note.
note_erasure_timeout.manual_erasing_description: You can also trigger erasing manually (without considering the timeout defined above):

revisions_snapshot_interval.note_revisions_snapshot_description: The Note revision snapshot interval is the time after which a new note revision will be created for the note. See <doc>wiki</doc> for more info.

revisions_snapshot_limit.note_revisions_snapshot_limit_descriptio: The note revision snapshot number limit refers to the maximum number of revisions that can be saved for each note. Where -1 means no limit, 0 means delete all revisions. You can set the maximum revisions for a single note through the #versioningLimit label.
revisions_snapshot_limit.erase_excess_revision_snapshots_prompt: Excess revision snapshots have been erased.

search_engine.title: Search Engine
search_engine.custom_search_engine_info: Custom search engine requires both a name and a URL to be set. If either of these is not set, DuckDuckGo will be used as the default search engine.
search_engine.custom_url_label: Custom search engine URL should include {keyword} as a placeholder for the search term.

tray.title: System Tray
tray.enable_tray: Enable tray (Trilium needs to be restarted for this change to take effect)

highlights_list.title: Highlights List
highlights_list.description: You can customize the highlights list displayed in the right panel:
highlights_list.visibility_description: You can hide the highlights widget per-note by adding a #hideHighlightWidget label.
highlights_list.shortcut_info: You can configure a keyboard shortcut for quickly toggling the right pane (including Highlights) in the Options -> Shortcuts (name 'toggleRightPane').

table_of_contents.title: Table of Contents
table_of_contents.description: Table of contents will appear in text notes when the note has more than a defined number of headings. You can customize this number:
table_of_contents.disable_info: You can also use this option to effectively disable TOC by setting a very high number.
table_of_contents.shortcut_info: You can configure a keyboard shortcut for quickly toggling the right pane (including TOC) in the Options -> Shortcuts (name 'toggleRightPane').

text_auto_read_only_size.title: Automatic Read-Only Size
text_auto_read_only_size.description: Automatic read-only note size is the size after which notes will be displayed in a read-only mode (for performance reasons).
text_auto_read_only_size.label: Automatic read-only size (text notes)

custom_date_time_format.title: Custom Date/Time Format
custom_date_time_format.description: Customize the format of the date and time inserted via <shortcut /> or the toolbar. See <doc>Day.js docs</doc> for available format tokens.

i18n.title: Localization
i18n.first-week-contains-first-day: First week contains first day of the year
i18n.first-week-contains-first-thursday: First week contains first Thursday of the year
i18n.first-week-info: First week contains first Thursday of the year is based on ISO 8601 standard.
i18n.first-week-warning: Changing first week options may cause duplicate with existing Week Notes and the existing Week Notes will not be updated accordingly.

backup.automatic_backup_description: Trilium can back up the database automatically:
backup.backup_recommendation: It's recommended to keep the backup turned on, but this can make application startup slow with large databases and/or slow storage devices.
backup.database_backed_up_to: Database has been backed up to {{backupFilePath}}

etapi.title: ETAPI
etapi.description: ETAPI is a REST API used to access Trilium instance programmatically, without UI.
etapi.no_tokens_yet: There are no tokens yet. Click on the button above to create one.
etapi.token_created_message: Copy the created token into clipboard. Trilium stores the token hashed and this is the last time you see it.
etapi.delete_token_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete ETAPI token "{{name}}"?

password.heading: Password
password.alert_message: Please take care to remember your new password. Password is used for logging into the web interface and to encrypt protected notes. If you forget your password, then all your protected notes are forever lost.
password.protected_session_timeout_description: Protected session timeout is a time period after which the protected session is wiped from the browser's memory. This is measured from the last interaction with protected notes. See
password.reset_confirmation: By resetting the password you will forever lose access to all your existing protected notes. Do you really want to reset the password?
password.reset_success_message: Password has been reset. Please set new password
password.password_mismatch: New passwords are not the same.
password.password_changed_success: Password has been changed. Trilium will be reloaded after you press OK.

multi_factor_authentication.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
multi_factor_authentication.description:
Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) adds an extra layer of security to your account. Instead of just entering a password to log in, MFA requires you to provide one or more additional pieces of evidence to verify your identity. This way, even if someone gets hold of your password, they still can't access your account without the second piece of information. It's like adding an extra lock to your door, making it much harder for anyone else to break in.

Please follow the instructions below to enable MFA. If you don't config correctly, login will fall back to password only.
multi_factor_authentication.electron_disabled: Multi-Factor Authentication is not supported in the desktop build currently.
multi_factor_authentication.totp_description: TOTP (Time-Based One-Time Password) is a security feature that generates a unique, temporary code which changes every 30 seconds. You use this code, along with your password to log into your account, making it much harder for anyone else to access it.
multi_factor_authentication.no_totp_secret_warning: To enable TOTP, you need to generate a TOTP secret first.
multi_factor_authentication.totp_secret_description_warning: After generating a new TOTP secret, you will be required to login again with the new TOTP secret.
multi_factor_authentication.totp_secret_warning: Please save the generated secret in a secure location. It will not be shown again.
multi_factor_authentication.totp_secret_regenerate_confirm: Are you sure you want to regenerate the TOTP secret? This will invalidate previous TOTP secret and all existing recovery codes.
multi_factor_authentication.recovery_keys_description: Single sign-on recovery keys are used to login in the even you cannot access your Authenticator codes.
multi_factor_authentication.recovery_keys_description_warning:
Recovery keys won't be shown again after leaving the page, keep them somewhere safe and secure.
After a recovery key is used it cannot be used again.
multi_factor_authentication.oauth_description: OpenID is a standardized way to let you log into websites using an account from another service, like Google, to verify your identity. The default issuer is Google, but you can change it to any other OpenID provider. Check here for more information. Follow these instructions to setup an OpenID service through Google.
multi_factor_authentication.oauth_description_warning: To enable OAuth/OpenID, you need to set the OAuth/OpenID base URL, client ID and client secret in the config.ini file and restart the application. If you want to set from environment variables, please set TRILIUM_OAUTH_BASE_URL, TRILIUM_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID and TRILIUM_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET.

shortcuts.multiple_shortcuts: Multiple shortcuts for the same action can be separated by comma.
shortcuts.electron_documentation: See Electron documentation for available modifiers and key codes.
shortcuts.set_all_to_default: Set all shortcuts to the default
shortcuts.confirm_reset: Do you really want to reset all keyboard shortcuts to the default?

spellcheck.title: Spell Check
spellcheck.description: These options apply only for desktop builds, browsers will use their own native spell check.
spellcheck.multiple_languages_info: Multiple languages can be separated by comma, e.g. "en-US, de-DE, cs".
spellcheck.restart-required: Changes to the spell check options will take effect after application restart.

sync_2.note_description: If you leave the proxy setting blank, the system proxy will be used (applies to desktop/electron build only).
sync_2.special_value_description: Another special value is noproxy which forces ignoring even the system proxy and respects NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED.
sync_2.test_description: This will test the connection and handshake to the sync server. If the sync server isn't initialized, this will set it up to sync with the local document.

attachment_detail_2.will_be_deleted_in: This attachment will be automatically deleted in {{time}}
attachment_detail_2.will_be_deleted_soon: This attachment will be automatically deleted soon
attachment_detail_2.deletion_reason: , because the attachment is not linked in the note's content. To prevent deletion, add the attachment link back into the content or convert the attachment into note.

bookmark_switch.bookmark_this_note: Bookmark this note to the left side panel

editability_select.note_is_editable: Note is editable if it's not too long.
editability_select.note_is_read_only: Note is read-only, but can be edited with a button click.
editability_select.note_is_always_editable: Note is always editable, regardless of its length.

tree-context-menu.converted-to-attachments: {{count}} notes have been converted to attachments.
tree-context-menu.convert-to-attachment-confirm: Are you sure you want to convert the selected notes into attachments of their parent notes? This operation only applies to Image notes, other notes will be skipped.

shared_info.shared_publicly: This note is shared publicly on {{- link}}.
shared_info.shared_locally: This note is shared locally on {{- link}}.

read-only-info.auto-read-only-note: This note is shown in a read-only mode for faster loading.

note_types.confirm-change: It is not recommended to change note type when note content is not empty. Do you want to continue anyway?

protect_note.toggle-on-hint: Note is not protected, click to make it protected
protect_note.toggle-off-hint: Note is protected, click to make it unprotected

shared_switch.shared-branch: This note exists only as a shared note, unsharing would delete it. Do you want to continue and thus delete this note?
shared_switch.inherited: Note cannot be unshared here because it is shared through inheritance from an ancestor.

template_switch.toggle-off-hint: Remove the note as a template

note_tree.automatically-collapse-notes-title: Notes will be collapsed after period of inactivity to declutter the tree.
note_tree.dropping-not-allowed: Dropping notes into this location is not allowed.
note_tree.clone-indicator-tooltip: This note has {{- count}} parents: {{- parents}}
note_tree.clone-indicator-tooltip-single: This note is cloned (1 additional parent: {{- parent}})

note_tree.subtree-hidden-tooltip_other: {{count}} child notes that are hidden from the tree

note_tree.subtree-hidden-moved-description-other: Child notes are hidden in the tree for this note.

note_detail.print_report_collection_content_other: {{count}} notes in the collection could not be printed because they are not supported or they are protected.

search_result.no_notes_found: No notes have been found for given search parameters.

frontend_script_api.async_warning: You're passing an async function to `api.runOnBackend()` which will likely not work as you intended.\nEither make the function synchronous (by removing `async` keyword), or use `api.runAsyncOnBackendWithManualTransactionHandling()`.
frontend_script_api.sync_warning: You're passing a synchronous function to `api.runAsyncOnBackendWithManualTransactionHandling()`,\nwhile you should likely use `api.runOnBackend()` instead.

ws.consistency-checks-failed: Consistency checks failed! See logs for details.

hoisted_note.confirm_unhoisting: Requested note '{{requestedNote}}' is outside of hoisted note '{{hoistedNote}}' subtree and you must unhoist to access the note. Do you want to proceed with unhoisting?

electron_integration.native-title-bar-description: For Windows and macOS, keeping the native title bar off makes the application look more compact. On Linux, keeping the native title bar on integrates better with the rest of the system.
electron_integration.background-effects-description: The Mica effect adds a blurred, stylish background to app windows, creating depth and a modern look. "Native title bar" must be disabled.
electron_integration.restart-app-button: Restart the application to view the changes

geo-map.create-child-note-title: Create a new child note and add it to the map
geo-map.create-child-note-instruction: Click on the map to create a new note at that location or press Escape to dismiss.

geo-map-context.add-note: Add a marker at this location

share.title: Share Settings
share.redirect_bare_domain: Redirect bare domain to Share page
share.redirect_bare_domain_description: Redirect anonymous users to the Share page instead of showing Login
share.show_login_link: Show Login link in Share theme
share.show_login_link_description: Add a login link to the Share page footer
share.share_root_not_shared: Note '{{noteTitle}}' has #shareRoot label but is not shared

time_selector.invalid_input: The entered time value is not a valid number.
time_selector.minimum_input: The entered time value needs to be at least {{minimumSeconds}} seconds.

content_language.title: Content languages
content_language.description: Select one or more languages that should appear in the language selection in the Basic Properties section of a read-only or editable text note. This will allow features such as spell-checking or right-to-left support.

switch_layout_button.title_vertical: Move editing pane to the bottom
switch_layout_button.title_horizontal: Move editing pane to the left

svg.export_to_png: The diagram could not be exported to PNG.
svg.export_to_svg: The diagram could not be exported to SVG.

cpu_arch_warning.title: Please download the ARM64 version
cpu_arch_warning.message_macos: TriliumNext is currently running under Rosetta 2 translation, which means you're using the Intel (x64) version on Apple Silicon Mac. This will significantly impact performance and battery life.
cpu_arch_warning.message_windows: TriliumNext is currently running emulation, which means you're using the Intel (x64) version on a Windows on ARM device. This will significantly impact performance and battery life.
cpu_arch_warning.recommendation: For the best experience, please download the native ARM64 version of TriliumNext from our releases page.

editorfeatures.title: Features
editorfeatures.emoji_completion_description: If enabled, emojis can be easily inserted into text by typing `:`, followed by the name of an emoji.
editorfeatures.note_completion_description: If enabled, links to notes can be created by typing `@` followed by the title of a note.
editorfeatures.slash_commands_description: If enabled, editing commands such as inserting line breaks or headings can be toggled by typing `/`.

table_view.delete_column_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this column? The corresponding attribute will be removed from all notes.

board_view.delete-column-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this column? The corresponding attribute will be deleted in the notes under this column as well.
board_view.column-already-exists: This column already exists on the board.

presentation_view.slide-overview: Toggle an overview of the slides

command_palette.configure_launch_bar_description: Open the launch bar configuration, to add or remove items.

modal.help_title: Display more information about this screen

call_to_action.next_theme_message: You are currently using the legacy theme, would you like to try the new theme?
call_to_action.background_effects_message: On Windows devices, background effects are now fully stable. The background effects adds a touch of color to the user interface by blurring the background behind it. This technique is also used in other applications such as Windows Explorer.
call_to_action.new_layout_message:
Weve introduced a modernized layout for Trilium. The ribbon has been removed and seamlessly integrated into the main interface, with a new status bar and expandable sections (such as promoted attributes) taking over key functions.

The new layout is enabled by default, and can be temporarily disabled via Options  Appearance.

settings_appearance.related_code_blocks: Color scheme for code blocks in text notes

collections.rendering_error: Unable to show content due to an error.

server.traefik_blocks_requests: If you are using the Traefik reverse proxy, it introduced a breaking change which affects the communication with the server.

breadcrumb.scroll_to_top_title: Jump to the beginning of the note

breadcrumb_badges.read_only_explicit_description:
This note has been manually set to read-only.
Click to edit it temporarily.
breadcrumb_badges.read_only_auto_description:
This note was set automatically to read-only mode for performance reasons. This automatic limit is adjustable from settings.

Click to edit it temporarily.
breadcrumb_badges.read_only_temporarily_disabled_descripti:
This note is currently editable, but it is normally read-only. The note will go back to being read-only as soon as you navigate to another note.

Click to re-enable read-only mode.
breadcrumb_badges.clipped_note_description:
This note was originally taken from {{url}}.

Click to navigate to the source webpage.
breadcrumb_badges.execute_script_description: This note is a script note. Click to execute the script.
breadcrumb_badges.execute_sql_description: This note is a SQL note. Click to execute the SQL query.
breadcrumb_badges.save_status_unsaved_tooltip: There are unsaved changes. They will be saved automatically in a moment.
breadcrumb_badges.save_status_error_tooltip: An error occurred while saving the note. If possible, try copying the note content elsewhere and reloading the application.
